name: Topo
description:
Review and report instances and components from Figma.


Topo is a Figma Plugin that will allow you report and comment on specific components and post it to any Slack channel or endpoint you want.


You can try Topo for free for up to 3 component reports. Once you buy a license you're entitled to a lifetime license key and updates, while supporting and contributing to build better features and more plugins and tools.


Get lifetime license


General usage:

  • Add Topo integration for Slack
  • With Topo opened, select an Instance or Component you want to review or report in your Figma file.
  • Hit 'Report'.
  • Check the Slack channel and keep track of what's being reported and resolved.


Crafted for design system and library management teams

Allow everyone to report component errors, bugs or issues in a single channel, integrated with the tools you use everyday. Keep track of what’s being resolved.


No need to stop designing

Stop jumping into calls and sending messages that get lost in the discussion. Report without leaving Figma.


Connect your own endpoint for integration with other tools

If you don’t want to use the default Slack app, you can send the reported data to any custom endpoint. Maybe your own API to create JIRA tickets?
